alert.note: Alert for Hartford; Tolland; Windham (Connecticut) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 18 at 6:49AM EDT until August 18 at 7:45AM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: The National Weather Service in Boston/Norton has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Windham County in northern Connecticut... Central Tolland County in northern Connecticut... Southeastern Hartford County in northern Connecticut... * Until 745 AM EDT. * At 649 AM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Meriden, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Hartford, New Britain, Manchester, East Hartford, Southington, Glastonbury, Newington, Vernon, Wethersfield, Mansfield, Windham, Berlin, Rocky Hill, Willimantic, Tolland, Coventry, Hebron, Marlborough, Willington, and Columbia. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
